original_text: They shall go with their flocks and with their herds to seek the Lord; but they shall not find him; he hath withdrawn himself from them.
korean_text: 그들이 양 떼와 소 떼를 끌고 여호와를 찾으러 갈지라도 만나지 못할 것은 이미 그들에게서 떠나셨음이라

sentences.original_text: They shall go with their flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 양 떼를 데리고 갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: but they shall not find him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그를 찾지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: he hath withdrawn himself from them
